predicate.note: Frames file for 'wriggle' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 49, Framenet entries Body movement and Self motion.

roleset.name: move part of the body slightly

example.name: usually wriggle out of
example.text: Its chief builder, Taiwan-born Feng-hsiung Hsu, nicknamed his brainchild ``the Weasel'' for its tactical flair at [*] wriggling out of horrible positions.
example.arg: [*] -> Its chief builder, Taiwan-born Feng-hsiung Hsu,
